actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, on completion of construction of a World War II Memorial in Area I of the District of Columbia and its environs, Congress should provide funding for the maintenance, security, and custodial and long-term care of the memorial by the National Park Service.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that, on completion of construction of a World War II Memorial in Area I of the District of Columbia and its environs, the Congress should provide funding for the maintenance, security, and custodial and long-term care of the memorial by the National Park Service.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, on completion of construction of a World War II Memorial in Area I of the District of Columbia and its environs, Congress should provide funding for the maintenance, security, and custodial and long-term care of the memorial by the National Park Service.
